SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN population_count >= 0 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN population_count < 0 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2020 THEN average_rent ELSE NULL END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2021 THEN average_rent ELSE NULL END) AS negative_value, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS dimension FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY area_name, dimension;

SELECT LANAME AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN school_performance >= 0 THEN school_performance ELSE NULL END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN school_performance < 0 THEN school_performance ELSE NULL END) AS negative_value FROM ( SELECT borough_name AS LANAME, rating AS school_performance FROM education_data WHERE institution_type IN ('school', 'college') AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ) AS subquery GROUP BY LANAME ORDER BY category;

SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN population_count >= 0 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN population_count < 0 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value, country_of_birth AS dimension FROM birth_country_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 GROUP BY area_name, country_of_birth ORDER BY area_name, country_of_birth;

SELECT crime_category AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2022 THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY crime_category ORDER BY crime_category;

SELECT year AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN inequality_index >= 0 THEN income ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN inequality_index < 0 THEN income ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM ( SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS year, average_income AS income, inequality_index FROM income_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ) AS subquery GROUP BY year ORDER BY year;

SELECT borough_name AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2019 AND 2023 THEN average_price ELSE NULL END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2019 AND 2023 THEN -average_price ELSE NULL END) AS negative_value FROM house_price_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2019 AND 2023 GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY borough_name;

SELECT "Local Authority" AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN registration_count > 0 THEN registration_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN registration_count < 0 THEN registration_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM vehicle_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Motor cycles' AND date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY "Local Authority" ORDER BY "Local Authority";

SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 THEN visitor_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, -SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 THEN visitor_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM library_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

SELECT borough_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN facility_count >= threshold THEN facility_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN facility_count < threshold THEN facility_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024 GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY category;

SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN year >= 2018 AND year <= 2023 THEN unit_growth ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN year < 2018 THEN unit_growth ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value, year AS dimension FROM ( SELECT area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS year, restaurant_count - LAG(restaurant_count, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY area_name ORDER BY date) AS unit_growth FROM restaurant_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2017 AND 2023 ) AS growth_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name, year ORDER BY area_name, year;

SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN age_group = '65+' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN age_group != '65+' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM population_data WHERE date = '2023' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

SELECT Area_Name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN diversity_index >= 0 THEN diversity_index ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN diversity_index < 0 THEN diversity_index ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM birth_country_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 GROUP BY Area_Name ORDER BY Area_Name;

SELECT Area AS category, MAX(CASE WHEN affordability_index >= 0 THEN affordability_index ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, MAX(CASE WHEN affordability_index < 0 THEN affordability_index ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY Area ORDER BY Area;

SELECT LANAME AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN year BETWEEN 2021 AND 2023 THEN enrollment ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN year BETWEEN 2021 AND 2023 THEN -enrollment ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM education_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2021 AND 2023 GROUP BY LANAME ORDER BY LANAME;

SELECT crime_category AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2022 THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value, borough_name AS dimension FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY crime_category, borough_name ORDER BY category, dimension;

SELECT borough_name AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN affordability_index >= 0 THEN affordability_index ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN affordability_index < 0 THEN affordability_index ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM ( SELECT borough_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS year, (average_price / median_income) AS affordability_index FROM house_price_data JOIN income_data ON house_price_data.borough_name = income_data.borough_name WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM house_price_data.date) = 2023 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM income_data.date) = 2023 ) AS affordability_data GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY category;
SELECT crime_category AS category, borough_name AS series, SUM(count) AS value FROM crime_data WHERE YEAR(date) = 2023 GROUP BY crime_category, borough_name ORDER BY crime_category, borough_name;

SELECT area_name AS category, ethnic_group AS series, population_count AS value, 'ethnicity' AS dimension FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group IN ('White British', 'Asian', 'Black', 'Mixed') GROUP BY area_name, ethnic_group ORDER BY area_name, ethnic_group;

SELECT YEAR(date) AS category, area_name AS series, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM birth_country_data WHERE YEAR(date) BETWEEN 2019 AND 2023 GROUP BY YEAR(date), area_name ORDER BY category, series;
SELECT area_name AS category, date AS series, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM population_data WHERE date IN ('2000', '2010', '2020') GROUP BY area_name, date ORDER BY area_name, date;

SELECT borough_name AS category, date AS series, average_income AS value, 'income' AS dimension FROM income_data WHERE date IN ('1999-00', '2000-01', '2001-02') GROUP BY borough_name, date, average_income ORDER BY borough_name, date;

SELECT area_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS series, average_price AS value FROM house_price_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date), average_price ORDER BY area_name, series;

SELECT SCHNAME AS category, LANAME AS series, performance_score AS value, '2023' AS dimension FROM education_data WHERE YEAR(date) = 2023 GROUP BY SCHNAME, LANAME, performance_score ORDER BY SCHNAME, LANAME;

SELECT borough_name AS category, vehicle_type AS series, SUM(registration_count) AS value FROM vehicle_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' AND vehicle_type IN ('Cars', 'Electric') GROUP BY borough_name, vehicle_type ORDER BY borough_name, vehicle_type;

SELECT area_name AS category, CASE WHEN cuisine_type = 'Licensed' THEN 'Licensed Restaurants Employment' ELSE 'Unlicensed Restaurants Employment' END AS series, SUM(restaurant_count) AS value FROM restaurant_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) = 2023 GROUP BY area_name, series ORDER BY area_name, series;

SELECT area_name AS category, property_type AS series, AVG(average_rent) AS value, '2023' AS dimension FROM rent_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') = '2023' GROUP BY area_name, property_type ORDER BY area_name, property_type;

SELECT borough_name AS category, facility_type AS series, COUNT(*) AS value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024 GROUP BY borough_name, facility_type ORDER BY borough_name, facility_type;
SELECT area_name AS category, library_name AS series, (visitor_count / 1000.0) AS value FROM library_data GROUP BY area_name, library_name ORDER BY area_name, library_name;

SELECT crime_category AS category, borough_name AS series, SUM(count) AS value, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') AS dimension FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY crime_category, borough_name, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY crime_category, borough_name, dimension;

SELECT area_name AS category, ethnic_group AS series, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group IN ('White British', 'All usual residents') GROUP BY area_name, ethnic_group ORDER BY area_name, ethnic_group;

SELECT Area_Name AS category, Broad_group AS series, SUM(Estimate) AS value, '3D' AS dimension FROM birth_country_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY Area_Name, Broad_group ORDER BY Area_Name, Broad_group;
SELECT area_name AS category, date AS series, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM population_data WHERE date IN (2010, 2020) GROUP BY area_name, date ORDER BY area_name, date;

SELECT borough_name AS category, 'Average Income' AS series, average_income AS value FROM income_data WHERE date = '2023' UNION ALL SELECT borough_name AS category, 'London Average' AS series, London_average AS value FROM income_data WHERE date = '2023' ORDER BY category, series;

SELECT area_name AS category, YEAR(date) AS series, AVG(average_price) AS value, 'Year' AS dimension FROM house_price_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, YEAR(date) ORDER BY area_name, YEAR(date);

SELECT borough_name AS category, institution_name AS series, SUM(student_count) AS value FROM education_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY borough_name, institution_name ORDER BY borough_name, institution_name;

SELECT borough_name AS category, vehicle_type AS series, SUM(registration_count) AS value, '2019-2023' AS dimension FROM vehicle_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' AND vehicle_type = 'Hybrid' GROUP BY borough_name, vehicle_type ORDER BY borough_name, vehicle_type;

SELECT area_name AS category, 'Licensed Restaurants Employment' AS series, SUM(restaurant_count) AS value FROM restaurant_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

SELECT area_name AS category, property_type AS series, AVG(median_rent) AS value FROM rent_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') = '2023' GROUP BY area_name, property_type ORDER BY area_name, property_type;

SELECT borough_name AS category, facility_type AS series, COUNT(gym_name) AS value, '2024' AS dimension FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) = 2024 GROUP BY borough_name, facility_type ORDER BY borough_name, facility_type;
SELECT area_name AS category, library_name AS series, SUM(visitor_count) AS value FROM library_data GROUP BY area_name, library_name ORDER BY area_name, library_name;
SELECT crime_category AS category, borough_name AS series, SUM(count) AS value FROM crime_data WHERE YEAR(date) = 2023 GROUP BY crime_category, borough_name ORDER BY crime_category, borough_name;
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', date) AS time, SUM(count) AS value FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time;
SELECT year AS time, SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'White British' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 GROUP BY year ORDER BY year;
SELECT Year AS time, COUNT(*) AS value FROM birth_country_data WHERE Year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2023 GROUP BY Year ORDER BY Year;
SELECT date AS time, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY date ORDER BY date;
SELECT date AS time, average_income AS value FROM income_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' GROUP BY date, area_name ORDER BY date;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, AVG(average_price) AS value FROM house_price_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') ORDER BY time;
SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING(date, 1, 4) AS INTEGER) AS time, SUM(student_count) AS value FROM education_data WHERE CAST(SUBSTRING(date, 1, 4) AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 2015 AND 2023 GROUP BY time ORDER BY time;

SELECT CAST(strftime('%Y', date) AS INTEGER) AS time, SUM(registration_count) AS value FROM vehicle_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Electric Vehicles' AND date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time;
SELECT CAST(YEAR(date) AS TEXT) AS time, SUM(restaurant_count) AS value FROM restaurant_data WHERE YEAR(date) BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 GROUP BY YEAR(date) ORDER BY YEAR(date)
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, AVG(average_rent) AS value FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') ORDER BY time;
SELECT CAST(year AS TEXT) AS time, SUM(facility_count) AS value, gym_type AS dimension FROM gym_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2024 GROUP BY year, gym_type ORDER BY year, gym_type;

SELECT CAST(YEAR(date) AS VARCHAR) AS time, SUM(visitor_count) / (population_count / 1000) AS value, area_name AS dimension FROM library_data JOIN population_data ON library_data.area_name = population_data.area_name AND YEAR(library_data.date) = YEAR(population_data.date) WHERE YEAR(library_data.date) BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 GROUP BY YEAR(library_data.date), area_name ORDER BY YEAR(library_data.date), area_name;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') AS time, SUM(count) AS value, CONCAT(borough_name, ' - ', crime_category) AS dimension FROM crime_data WHERE YEAR(date) = 2023 GROUP BY time, dimension ORDER BY time, dimension;
SELECT date AS time, average_income AS value, income_level AS dimension FROM income_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' GROUP BY date, income_level ORDER BY date, income_level;
SELECT date AS time, population_count AS value, age_group AS dimension FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY date, age_group ORDER BY date, age_group;
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS time, AVG(count) AS value FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY time;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, AVG(average_price) AS value FROM house_price_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') ORDER BY time;
SELECT YEAR(date) AS time, AVG(registration_count) AS value FROM vehicle_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Cars' AND YEAR(date) BETWEEN 2015 AND 2023 GROUP BY YEAR(date) ORDER BY YEAR(date);
SELECT year AS time, AVG(percentage) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 GROUP BY year ORDER BY year;
SELECT YEAR(date) AS time, SUM(restaurant_count) AS value FROM restaurant_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY YEAR(date) ORDER BY YEAR(date);
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS time, COUNT(DISTINCT gym_name) AS value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2010 AND 2023 GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY time;

SELECT CAST(strftime('%Y', date) AS INTEGER) AS time, SUM(visitor_count) / (population_count / 1000) AS value FROM library_data JOIN population_data ON library_data.area_name = population_data.area_name WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' GROUP BY time, library_data.area_name ORDER BY time;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, AVG(median_rent) AS value FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y');
SELECT Year AS time, SUM(Estimate) AS value FROM birth_country_data WHERE Year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 GROUP BY Year ORDER BY Year
SELECT Year AS time, SUM(student_count) AS value FROM education_data WHERE institution_type IN ('school', 'college') AND Year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2023 GROUP BY Year ORDER BY Year;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, CONCAT(borough_name, ' - ', crime_category) AS series, SUM(count) AS value FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y'), borough_name, crime_category ORDER BY time, series;

SELECT year AS time, area_name AS series, SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'White British' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS value FROM ethnicity_data GROUP BY year, area_name ORDER BY year, area_name;
SELECT Year AS time, Broad_group AS series, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM birth_country_data WHERE Year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2023 GROUP BY Year, Broad_group ORDER BY Year, Broad_group;

SELECT date AS time, area_name AS series, population_count / NULLIF(area, 0) AS value FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY date, area_name ORDER BY date, area_name;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, borough_name AS series, AVG(income_level) AS value FROM income_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') BETWEEN '2015' AND '2023' GROUP BY time, series ORDER BY time, series;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, area_name AS series, average_price AS value FROM house_price_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') BETWEEN '2010' AND '2023' GROUP BY time, series ORDER BY time, series;
SELECT Year AS time, LANAME AS series, Performance AS value FROM education_data WHERE Year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2023 GROUP BY Year, LANAME, Performance ORDER BY Year, LANAME;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, borough_name AS series, SUM(CASE WHEN vehicle_type = 'Electric' THEN registration_count ELSE 0 END) AS value FROM vehicle_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y'), borough_name ORDER BY time, series;
SELECT YEAR(date) AS time, area_name AS series, SUM(restaurant_count) AS value FROM restaurant_data WHERE YEAR(date) BETWEEN 2010 AND 2023 GROUP BY YEAR(date), area_name ORDER BY time, series;

SELECT CAST(strftime('%Y', date) AS INTEGER) AS time, area_name AS series, AVG(average_rent) AS value FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY time, series ORDER BY time, series;

SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS time, borough_name AS series, COUNT(DISTINCT gym_name) AS value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2018 AND 2023 GROUP BY time, series ORDER BY time, series;

SELECT CAST(YEAR(date) AS TEXT) AS time, area_name AS series, SUM(visitor_count) / (population_count / 1000) AS value FROM library_data JOIN population_data ON library_data.area_name = population_data.area_name WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY YEAR(date), area_name ORDER BY time, series;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') AS time, crime_category AS series, SUM(count) AS value, borough_name AS dimension FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m'), crime_category, borough_name ORDER BY time, series, dimension;
SELECT year AS time, ethnic_group AS series, population_count AS value, area_name AS dimension FROM ethnicity_data GROUP BY year, ethnic_group, area_name ORDER BY year, ethnic_group, area_name;

SELECT Year AS time, Area_Name AS series, Estimate AS value, Broad_group AS dimension FROM birth_country_data WHERE Year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2023 GROUP BY Year, Area_Name, Broad_group, Estimate ORDER BY Year, Area_Name, Broad_group;

SELECT CAST(date AS TEXT) AS time, area_name AS series, population_count AS value, 'population_density' AS dimension FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY date, area_name, population_count ORDER BY date, area_name;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, ethnic_group AS series, AVG(median_income) AS value, borough_name AS dimension FROM income_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') BETWEEN '2010' AND '2023' GROUP BY time, series, dimension ORDER BY time, series, dimension;

SELECT crime_category AS category, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) AS x_value, SUM(count) AS y_value FROM crime_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 GROUP BY crime_category, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) ORDER BY crime_category, x_value;
SELECT ethnic_group AS category, SUM(population_count) AS x_value, AVG(percentage) AS y_value FROM ethnicity_data GROUP BY ethnic_group ORDER BY ethnic_group;
SELECT Area_Name AS category, AVG(population_count) AS x_value, AVG(percentage) AS y_value FROM birth_country_data WHERE date LIKE '2022%' GROUP BY Area_Name ORDER BY Area_Name;

SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN date = 2010 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS x_value, SUM(CASE WHEN date = 2020 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS y_value FROM population_data WHERE date IN (2010, 2020) GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

SELECT area_name AS category, YEAR(date) AS x_value, average_income AS y_value FROM income_data WHERE YEAR(date) BETWEEN 2022 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name, YEAR(date), average_income ORDER BY area_name, x_value;
SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(average_price) AS x_value, AVG(median_price) AS y_value FROM house_price_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') = '2022' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;
SELECT LANAME AS category, Year AS x_value, AVG("Performance Indicator") AS y_value FROM education_data WHERE Year BETWEEN 2021 AND 2023 GROUP BY LANAME, Year ORDER BY LANAME, Year;

SELECT area_name AS category, YEAR(date) AS x_value, COUNT(vehicle_type) AS y_value, vehicle_type AS dimension FROM vehicle_data WHERE YEAR(date) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name, YEAR(date), vehicle_type ORDER BY area_name, YEAR(date), vehicle_type;

SELECT area_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, SUM(restaurant_count) AS y_value FROM restaurant_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY area_name, x_value;

SELECT area_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, AVG(average_rent) AS y_value FROM rent_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY area_name, x_value;

SELECT borough_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, COUNT(facility_type) AS y_value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 GROUP BY borough_name, x_value ORDER BY category, x_value;

SELECT area_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, SUM(visitor_count) / (population_count / 1000) AS y_value FROM library_data JOIN population_data ON library_data.area_name = population_data.area_name WHERE date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY area_name, x_value;

SELECT crime_category AS category, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) AS x_value, SUM(count) AS y_value, borough_name AS dimension FROM crime_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 GROUP BY crime_category, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date), borough_name ORDER BY category, x_value, dimension;
SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS x_value, AVG(percentage) AS y_value FROM ethnicity_data GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;
SELECT Area_Name AS category, AVG(population_count) AS x_value, AVG(percentage) AS y_value FROM birth_country_data WHERE date LIKE '2022%' GROUP BY Area_Name ORDER BY Area_Name;

SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN date = '2010' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS x_value, SUM(CASE WHEN date = '2020' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS y_value FROM population_data WHERE date IN ('2010', '2020') GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

SELECT area_name AS category, YEAR(date) AS x_value, average_income AS y_value FROM income_data WHERE YEAR(date) BETWEEN 2022 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name, YEAR(date), average_income ORDER BY area_name, x_value;

SELECT area_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, AVG(average_price) AS y_value FROM house_price_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY area_name, x_value;
SELECT LANAME AS category, Year AS x_value, AVG("Performance Indicator") AS y_value FROM education_data WHERE Year BETWEEN 2021 AND 2023 GROUP BY LANAME, Year ORDER BY LANAME, Year;

SELECT area_name AS category, YEAR(date) AS x_value, COUNT(registration_count) AS y_value, vehicle_type AS dimension FROM vehicle_data WHERE YEAR(date) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name, YEAR(date), vehicle_type ORDER BY area_name, x_value, dimension;

SELECT area_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, SUM(restaurant_count) AS y_value FROM restaurant_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY area_name, x_value;

SELECT area_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, AVG(average_rent) AS y_value FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2017-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY area_name, x_value;

SELECT borough_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, COUNT(DISTINCT gym_name) AS y_value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2019 AND 2024 GROUP BY borough_name, x_value ORDER BY category, x_value;

SELECT area_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, SUM(visitor_count) / (population_count / 1000) AS y_value FROM library_data JOIN population_data ON library_data.area_name = population_data.area_name WHERE date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY area_name, x_value;

SELECT crime_category AS category, SUM(count) AS x_value, COUNT(DISTINCT date) AS y_value, borough_name AS dimension FROM crime_data WHERE YEAR(date) = 2023 GROUP BY crime_category, borough_name ORDER BY category, dimension;
SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS x_value, AVG(percentage) AS y_value FROM ethnicity_data GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;
SELECT Area_Name AS category, AVG(population_count) AS x_value, AVG(percentage) AS y_value FROM birth_country_data WHERE date LIKE '2022%' GROUP BY Area_Name ORDER BY Area_Name;

SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN date = 2010 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS x_value, SUM(CASE WHEN date = 2020 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS y_value FROM population_data WHERE date IN (2010, 2020) GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

SELECT area_name AS category, YEAR(date) AS x_value, AVG(median_income) AS y_value FROM income_data WHERE YEAR(date) BETWEEN 2022 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name, YEAR(date) ORDER BY area_name, YEAR(date);

SELECT area_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, average_price AS y_value FROM house_price_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date), average_price ORDER BY area_name, x_value;
SELECT LANAME AS category, Year AS x_value, AVG("Performance Indicator") AS y_value FROM education_data WHERE Year BETWEEN 2021 AND 2023 GROUP BY LANAME, Year ORDER BY LANAME, Year;

SELECT Local_Authority AS category, Year AS x_value, COUNT(*) AS y_value, Vehicle_Type AS dimension FROM vehicle_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY Local_Authority, Year, Vehicle_Type ORDER BY Local_Authority, Year, Vehicle_Type;

SELECT area_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, SUM(restaurant_count) AS y_value FROM restaurant_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name, x_value ORDER BY category, x_value;

SELECT area_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, AVG(average_rent) AS y_value FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2016-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY area_name, x_value;

SELECT borough_name AS category, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS x_value, COUNT(facility_type) AS y_value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2018 AND 2024 GROUP BY borough_name, x_value ORDER BY category, x_value;
